content:
{"name": "St. Bartholomew's Community Ministry - Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "We distribute grocery bags filled with proteins, grains, vegetables, fruits, and dry goods every Thursday. 
To make an appointment, please call 212-378-0234 or email us at pantry@crossroadsnyc.org. You can also find us at plentifulapp.com.
Family size determines the amount of food that each family will receive.
Please remember to bring current identification with proof of address for all household members on your first day.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.crossroadsnyc.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "108 East 51st Street", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10022", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7573398, "longitude": -73.97275599999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 378-0229", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "17:45"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "11:45", "closes_at": "12:45"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "11:45", "closes_at": "12:45"}, {"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "11:45", "closes_at": "12:45"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of housing with cooking facilities required."}]}
